stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
The graph above shows the loanable funds market for a country.

  1. Assume that now the country’s government increases deficit spending. Explain how the increase in deficit spending will affect the real interest rate.

  2. Indicate how the real interest rate change you identified in part (a) will affect investment in plant and equipment.

  3. Explain how the real interest rate change you identified in part (a) will affect long-term economic growth.

  4. Explain how the real interest rate change you identified in part (a) will affect each of the following in the foreign exchange market.

    1. The demand for the country’s currency

    2. The value of the country’s currency
